thread.title: Trump vows to fight 'epidemic' of human trafficking - ABC News
thread.title_full: Trump vows to fight 'epidemic' of human trafficking - ABC News

author: Abc News
title: Trump vows to fight 'epidemic' of human trafficking - ABC News
text: Trump vows to fight 'epidemic' of human trafficking By The Associated Press WASHINGTON Â— Feb 23, 2017, 2:59 PM ET 0 Shares WATCH Investigating the Dark Underworld of Sex Trafficking in Holland 0 Shares Email President Donald Trump says he will bring the "full force and weight" of the U.S. government to combat an "epidemic" of human trafficking . The president is meeting at the White House with senior advisers and representatives of organizations that deal with trafficking. His daughter, Ivanka Trump, is among those in attendance. Trump calls human trafficking a problem that is "not talked about enough." He says he will order the departments of Justice and Homeland Security to take a hard look at the resources they are devoting to addressing the issue. 0 Shares
